article_title: Ex-Ellis CEO 'not going out to pasture'
article_text: On the day James Connolly was to interview for a position leading the largest hospital in Schenectady County, he put on his best blue suit and showed up early to the hospital to relax, read the paper, have a cup of coffee. The first headline he saw? The state-appointed Berger Commission had finally issued its edicts on statewide health reform.
